(OOC: Grave Digger is currently dead, although I'm gonna ask Earth if I may=
 use his body. Half of the Destron Ship/Base Predator is destroyed, and can=
 be reapired, but it will take a while. Alloran2's Destron characters are s=
till in the base, dead or alive is up to him)

::Eclipse::

    He sniffed =
around the Ark, wondering what he had gotten himself into. He headed back t=
o the Maximal Ship (CF).
    "Attention Maximals, I am heading to your ship=
 as I speak," He said into his comm. "I mean you no harm, I simply wish to =
inform someone about the changes on Cybertron."
  ----- Original Message --=
--- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, =
September 06, 2000 6:11 PM
  Subject: Re: destron double cross



       
 =
      My Groups | nbwrpg Main Page | Start a new group!  



  (OOC: Sorry =
for this OOC, but, Bomb? Where was Grave Digger when that happened?.)
    -=
---- Original Message ----- 
    From: ddsg sdgfd 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
    Sent: Wednesday, September 06, 2000 8:40 PM
    Subject: destron do=
uble cross





      Grave digger watched as the devise was ejected. Oh no=
 way.... Copper grab it the bot flew in the air and caught the bomb. "30 se=
c boss."

        Fine grave digger said" pull the bomb here and everyone g=
et out."

          "What about you you will be destroyed."

          " id=
 rather be destroyrd then face datatron with faliure go now!."

       The =
destron flew out of the base not looking back. Grave digger clutched the bo=
mb to his chest.... 5....4.......3........2..........1..........boom.
